metadata.title: CVE-2021-28276 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in jhead 3.04 and 3.05 via a wildaddress read in the ProcessCanonMakerNoteDir function in makernote.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28276` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.00-8~ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jhead package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.00-8~ubuntu0.1').
